Name: Memento Infernum
About the game: Mission... You failed God, and now you have to repay for what you did. Go and clear Holy Place out of all the demons that infest it. And do that by mastering movement and gunplay in this new demanding top-down shooter. Priest.. Dash through battlefield as Priest with uncovered dark past, and follow his road of penance. Skillful as you are, take care of your fragile mortality, as there is a lot that want to take it away. Demon... The Graveyard is no place for mere mortal. Filled to the brim with randomly generated waves of evil, from lost souls, through cultist, to even Prince of Underworld, it will require you to learn behavior of every adversary if You want to succeed. Gun... And to face all these hordes of Evil alone, merciful God will send you weapons to fight with. Every gun being unique, they will require you to change accordingly your gameplay. Master all of them if you want to go far. HELL Combine your movement, gunplay and knowledge of enemy to clear the whole Holy Place and see the end of Priest's story. And if that is not enough, try infinite hell mode, when you can prove your worth by slaying even more demons and beating highscore doing that. Let your damnation start! Play Memento Infernum now!
